Text: Everyone I chat with says TvTeam sucks big time ass. But what I see while searching their offerings is a ton of offerings. My friends probably think that they suck big time ass because to find screens - that might not be there at all - you need to scroll though too much annoying and self bloating info. Apparently they are @@@ JustDifferent !!! @@@ so my friends need to ease up on the "they suck big time ass" comments.
